reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with a perfect fit and true-to-size measurements.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable, and Soft
items.body: I love this sweater! I purchased in three colors and absolutely love how soft and comfortable they are! They are lightweight, and can easily be worn in a variety of climates. The colors are vibrant and beautiful! Read more
items.author: Kristina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice! Love the neckline!
items.body: Runs true to size. The material is super soft , it’s fairly light weight and not too warm. I have washed it and line dried it and it came Out perfectly . I love the neckline! Have already purchased in another color as well Read more
items.author: BOB VOGEL

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater; good value
items.body: Soft & comfortable. True to size. Read more
items.author: Michelle McFall

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great on and good value
items.body: Nana here. This shirt is great. Stretchey, is soft, launders well, fits well and was great value for the money. I'm 5'3", 128lbs and muscular build and the Small was perfect albeit a bit roomy. Read more
items.author: JZM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material good fit
items.body: Perfect sweater. Heavy but not too heavy and sizing was perfect. Read more
items.author: Jane

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not going to last long and colors not accurate
items.body: The color of this top is not “Red.” It is a warm rosy pinkish color, slightly lighter than it appears on my screen. I like the scalloped neckline and the top is nice and soft but it started getting areas thin enough to see through after only one wear (washed twice- on delicate inside out in a delicates bag, lain flat to dry, then tossed on low for two minutes to fluff back up) which leads me to believe it won’t last long. It was a reasonable price but I hate adding to the fast fashion landfill situation so know this is not a piece you’ll have for years and years. I got the Medium which is where their size chart put me (bust 39”), despite Amazon saying I should order Large. I think the Med fits perfectly and doesn’t cling. A Large would have been very oversized so unless you like clothes super baggy, go with their size chart. A word of caution: while this color is pretty close to what’s shown (even though the name is inaccurate), I also ordered the Purple and that one is WAY lighter and greyer than shown. It’s a muddy lilac, not purple. That one is going back as the color looks terrible on me. Read more
items.author: Blossom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!!!
items.body: So many good things to say about this adorable sweater. First off, so so soft. Sized perfect. Had the perfect amount of stretchiness. I had so many compliments when I wore it. I’m beyond obsessed with the neckline. I loved it so much I bought it in a second color! Fantastic quality!! Read more
items.author: Natalie Morley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: Love this shirt it fits well and I love the cute scalloped neck line. It’s also super soft and washes well. I am 5’1 127 lbs and the small fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: M.Hilton

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Charcoalgray, Blue, Purple, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
